scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:local: npm run db:local && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.ds: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run test:wait-and-run"
scripts.test:all:local: npm run db:verify && npm run test:all
scripts.test:sequential: node scripts/wait-for-servers.js && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:frontend: npm run generate:build-info && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
